# Capital Markets â€“ Risk Controls

## Risk Management Rules
- Pre-trade risk checks are mandatory.
- Exposure limits must be enforced deterministically.
- Risk breaches must be explicitly flagged.

## Control Invariants
- Risk evaluation must be reproducible.
- Limit checks must be traceable.
- Overrides require explicit authorization.

## Prohibited
- Hidden risk thresholds
- Silent limit breaches
- Risk logic embedded in execution flows
